member.summary: Gets or sets the student's DA number.

member.name: P:PAT.Models.Entities.Student.EmployeeNumber
member.summary: Gets or sets Student's employee number. Sometimes, when a student is a tutor and they are paid, they get an employee number. This field will be nullable and often be just an empty string as the only difference between a tutor and a tutee will be their role and an employee number. Though this will be a little complicated as a student can have an employee number, be a tutor and a tutee at the same time.
